thread.title: EastEnders fans left STUNNED after seeing Sid Owen's surprisingly palatial house
thread.title_full: EastEnders fans left STUNNED after seeing Sid Owen's surprisingly palatial house

author: irishmirror
title: EastEnders fans left STUNNED after seeing Sid Owen's surprisingly palatial house
text:
EastEnders fans left STUNNED after seeing Sid Owen's surprisingly palatial house The veteran soap star has clearly been earning big money on the BBC1 soap Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Through The Keyhole: See Sid Owen’s French mansion Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
His on-screen character, Ricky Butcher, is known for residing in a rather grim terraced house in Albert Sqaure. 
But, when he's not entertaining soap fans on EastEnders, it turns out that Sid Owen is living it up in a stunning mansion - which has left people rather open-mouthed. 
The impressive abode was shown as part of Through The Keyhole, which saw Keith Lemon explore the 44-year-old actor’s converted farmhouse in the south of France. Sid Owen's House on Through the Keyhole (Photo: ITV) 
The property boasts nine bedrooms and an outside swimming pool, plus some serious interior design work - not to mention plenty of cool features, including a pinball machine and a wet bar. 
Naturally, viewers were left dazzled by the sight and could hardly believe their eyes. 
Taking to social media, one fan wrote: "Ah, I love Sid Owen and what a beautiful house!" while another added: "How the f*** has Sid Owen got that gaff #rick !". The property has an open-space lounge with modern design features (Photo: ITV) 
Another, who seemed rather shocked, added: "Still not over Sid Owen's gaff on Through The Keyhole, lads." 
Even Strictly's Judge Rinder, who was a contestant on the show, admitted said Sid had a "lovely house and a lot of taste". 
It wasn't just his houser that received praise. One viewer said: "What a good sport Sid is. Never really rated him before ('cos I'd never really though about him) but wow. Lovely guy." Sid Owen's House on Through the Keyhole (Photo: ITV) Keith Lemon poses poolside at Sid's house on Through The Keyhole (Photo: ITV) 
Sid is, of course famous for playing the long-suffering, docile Ricky Butcher in EastEnders between 1988 and 2012, although he briefly dabbled in the music industry by releasing Good Thing Going in 2000. 
Having taken part in I'm A Celebrity in 2005 and coming in third place, he was a a contestant on 2012's Strictly Come Dancing, and was voted off in week five. 
Most recently, he took part in Celebrity Masterchef. Like us on Facebook
